sentences.english: Three months later, Ya-lei raped her.
sentences.chinese: 三個月後，亞雷姦污了她。

sentences.english: One of David's sons raped his step-sister.
sentences.chinese: 大衛的一個兒子姦污了他同父異母的妹妹。

sentences.english: As mentioned above, it can protect women avoid being raped.
sentences.chinese: 就如以上所說的，它可以保護女性避免被人姦污。

sentences.english: She said. 'It's only people who ravish things.
sentences.chinese: 她說，“這是人類把一切事物姦污了。”

sentences.english: They do not know a this woman rape or seduce in idea how many times.
sentences.chinese: 他們在意念中不知把這個女人姦污了多少次。
